text: Chhokar is a village located in the Ludhiana West tehsil, of Ludhiana district, Punjab. ==Administration== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India). {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses||122|| || |- | Population ||618 ||321 ||297 |- | Child (0-6) ||58||28||30 |- | Schedule Caste ||391 ||203||188 |- | Schedule Tribe || 0||0 ||0 |- | Literacy ||84.64 % ||88.05 % ||80.90 % |- | Total Workers ||216||193||23 |- | Main Worker ||207|| 0||0 |- | Marginal Worker ||9|| 6||3 |- |} ==Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil== ==Air travel connectivity== The closest airport to the village is Sahnewal Airport. ==External links== * Villages in Ludhiana West Tehsil ==References== Category:Villages in Ludhiana West tehsil
title: Chhokar (Ludhiana West)
